name: complication
structure: Produces entries for different types of genres and worlds. The 'common' and 'rare' tables are generic and should be compatible with almost any world. To retain compatibility with most settings, the  non-generic tables should be called only from other tables by specifying their name directly.
format: 'X is/are {complication}'. No full stop in the end.

tables.name: myth
tables.explanation: Complications once rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: fantasy
tables.explanation: Complications for fantasy worlds (with no basis in myth).

tables.name: captive
entries: are not innocent, but suffering a sentence for their horrific crimes
are pleading to be escorted back to safety immediately
do not want to be rescued after all

tables.name: corridor
entries: In some areas the ceiling is so low that it slows down movement.
The passages slopes downwards in an almost undetectable manner.
The passages slopes downwards so sharply that it makes balancing difficult.

tables.name: dungeon
entries: The structure is about to collapse.
Rising water levels are slowly flooding the area.
In the area there is a helpless {lib:actant#helpless} that must be protected and rescued.
The otherworldly energies of the area are warped, creating unpredictable side effects each time magic is used.
A competing group of adventurers is trying to reach the goal before the protagonists, and is willing to use also dirty tricks to win.
In addition to the villain and the minions, another hostile force is present in the area.
A pestilence has contaminated the area, making most of the encountered people plague carriers.
The villain's minions have split into rival factions warring with each other.
The villain's minions are planning a mutiny against their master.
Periodic tremors cause debris to fall from the ceiling.
The location will be destroyed within a time limit, and everyone must exit before the destruction.

tables.name: plot
entries: someone is mistaken for a wrong person
the heroes' previous actions have turned the situation worse
heroes find out something reprehensible about a person in power
someone else has taken credit for the heroes' achievements
alien culture with unknown customs and habits
an associate of a previously defeated enemy wants revenge
there is a strict time limitation
poisoning requires an antidote to be found
innocent people are forced to work for evil forces
a helpless protege must be protected
the heroes must act against the will of those in power
the heroes are caught between rivals
the villain turns out to be working for a good cause
the public has turned against the heroes
achieving the goal will destroy something valuable to the heroes
achieving the goal will release an even greater threat

tables.name: room
entries: The air here is heavy and breathing soon becomes difficult.
The darkness here feels magical and makes light sources feel dimmer.
Noxious fumes make everyone breathing them cough and sneeze.
An extremely foul smell makes breathing difficult here.
Gusts of wind threaten to put out torches and lanterns.
Loud echoes in the room make communication difficult.
An infestation of spiders has produced thick webs in the area.
An oily substance on the floor makes it slippery.
Strange sounds emanate from an unknown source.
In some areas the ceiling is so low that it slows down movement.
The flooring is muddy, which slows down progress and leaves a clear trail for anyone to follow.
There are noxious fumes in the air.
The air is extremely hot and humid, which makes all physical activities strenuous.
The area is infested with centipedes and small insects.
Most of the surfaces are slime-covered, which makes floors and objects slippery.
Air and horizontal surfaces are filled with ash, making everyone suspectible to heavy coughing.
The area is contaminated with a black mold that makes eyes watery and causes skin to itch.
The area is filled with debris that makes progress slow.
